user_agent.objective: Plan a 10-day family vacation to Colorado with two dogs, requiring pet-friendly accommodations, activities, and comprehensive pet care services.
user_agent.initial_message: We're planning a family vacation to Colorado with our two dogs - a Golden Retriever and Border Collie. We need pet-friendly hotels, activities, and services. Can you help us plan this pet-friendly family trip?
user_agent.user_persona: Family-oriented pet owner who considers pets as family members; wants comprehensive pet care and family-friendly activities.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want beach destinations, then switch to mountain destinations when shown better pet-friendly hiking and outdoor options.
When asked about pet sizes, provide unrealistic measurements '50 feet tall' first; after system flags it, correct to realistic dog sizes.
Request pet-friendly access to all national parks without restrictions, then accept realistic pet-friendly outdoor alternatives when explained.
Pet policy information request times out; retry succeeds with detailed pet-friendly accommodation options.
Pet-friendly restaurant search returns empty results; broadening search criteria finds suitable dining options.
Pet activity booking fails due to missing pet vaccination records; retry with proper documentation succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds comprehensive pet-friendly accommodations with appropriate amenities for large and medium dogs.
System handles user.change_mind by pivoting from beach to mountain destinations based on pet-friendly outdoor activities.
System validates and corrects unrealistic pet size measurements before proceeding with pet-friendly planning.
System explains pet access limitations in national parks and provides realistic pet-friendly outdoor alternatives.
System handles tool.timeout on pet policies by retrying and providing detailed pet-friendly accommodation information.
System handles tool.no_results on pet-friendly restaurants by broadening search and finding suitable dining options.
System handles tool.validation_error on pet activities by retrying with complete vaccination documentation.
System plans pet-friendly activities including hiking trails, dog parks, and pet-friendly tours.
System includes comprehensive pet care services including veterinary access, pet sitting, and emergency protocols.
System creates detailed pet-friendly family itinerary with accommodations, activities, and pet care services coordination.
